org.factcenter.qilin.primitives.generic

Class ElGamal.PK<G>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.factcenter.qilin.primitives.generic.ElGamal.PK<G>
  • Type Parameters:
    G - The underlying group element type. This is used as both the plaintext and the ciphertext type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cipher.PK<Pair<G,G>,G,java.math.BigInteger>, Homomorphic<Pair<G,G>,G,java.math.BigInteger>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ECElGamal.PK, ElGamal.SK, ZpElGamal.PK
    Enclosing class:
    ElGamal

    public static class ElGamal.PK<G>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Cipher.PK<Pair<G,G>,G,java.math.BigInteger>, Homomorphic<Pair<G,G>,G,java.math.BigInteger>
    Represents the public key in the ElGamal cryptosystem. Given a public-key object, it is possible to encrypt messages and perform homomorphic operations. Decryption requires the secret key.
    See Also:
    ElGamal.SK
